wikipedia_page.main: Stanley Eugene Storton (born 5 January 1939) is an English former football player and manager.

link_mentions.page: List of Bradford City A.F.C. players

response: McAdam played one Second Division game for Albion Rovers at Cliftonhill in the 1977–78 season, before crossing the border to join Northwich Victoria. Under the stewardship of Ray Williams, the "Vics" finished tenth in the Northern Premier League in 1978–79, and then became founder members of the Alliance Premier League. The Drill Field outfit finished eighth in 1979–80, fourth in 1980–81 under Stan Storton, and sixth in 1981–82 under John King.
